Description: Four amulets: 187 - Red jasper thet-girdle amulet. 188 - Glazed composition djed-pillar amulet; Hieroglyphic text on shaft. 189 - Steatite heart-amulet bearing inlaid glass scene of Ay adoring benu-bird; Hieroglyphic text. 190 - Cornelian lentoid name-bead; Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: The Big number EA50742 was originally given to the register number 1912,0210.82. After joining EA50734/1912,0210.74 with 1912,0210.82, the Big number was re-used.
Published: Andrews, Amulets of Ancient Egypt (1994): p.98
